body_text:
Where is this picture from? How do I use Reverse Image Search to find the source of an anime/manga image? So I see an image from what I believe is from either an anime or manga. What are some ways that I can go about finding what series it's from?
Try these options:

Google reverse image search (browser built-in support and plugins)
Other reverse image search engines: TinEye, SauceNao, iqdb
Technique: Cropping the image
Animated GIF: Picking the right frame

Who are the girls in this image? From Punch Line ep.7 6:35:

There are five girls here. Who are they?

Blonde with the green dress.  
Brunette with the blue dress. Meika?  
Redhead with the purple dress. Mikatan, probably.  
Slender brunette with the brown dress.  
Green haired in the lower right.  


EDIT: The image is from Punch Line. Episode 7 at 6 minutes and 35 seconds. So remove the duplicate tagging. It is the characters depicted that need identification.
